Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to My Life Is Murder by the same director and A Serpent’s Kiss by Jim Hollenbaugh or a pretty much boring Stake Land.
